title: Free Rotation Bug

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! Here are this week's free champions.

body: This weeks free rotation changed according to the website, 4 hours ago. It's suppose to be Diana, Gankplank, Janna, Jhin Malaphite, Nidalee, Quinn,  Thresh, Vel'koz, and Xerath, but for me I still have last weeks free rotation, {{champion:63}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:110}} There was no update when I was logging on today, when I was queuing I noticed everyone else had the free rotation champions (I know this because I'm playing on a level 16 smurf, doubt they all had the same champs as free rotation.) When I select my champion, I still can only choose from last weeks free rotation and the ones I already own.

replies.body: It is entirely possible that this is due to our announcements vs when the FTP Rotation actually goes live.  It's entirely possible that the announcement went out before the actual changes went through.  The best advice I can give is to sit-tight and give it a chance to update.  If you still don't see the new rotation by tomorrow, be sure to reply back and give me a heads up!
Thank you, I assumed this was the reason but I didn't find the use of actually giving the announcement early.
Yeah I was wondering the same thing!
idk how much times I have to bump this
